name: Haunted Hotel: Beyond the Page Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Hotel: Beyond the Page Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Hotel: Beyond the Page Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Haunted Hotel: Beyond the Page Collector's Edition on PC.
